summary: A couple elopes to get married and set up home hoping that just love will do the trick - but that's just the beginning of their story.
cast: Vivek Oberoi|Rani Mukerji|Shah Rukh Khan|Tabu|Sandhya Mridul|Tanuja|Satish Shah|Swaroop Sampat|Tinnu Anand|Ujjwal Rana|Anju Mahendru|Sharat Saxena|Shehnaz Anand|Anu Ansari|Chandrashekhar Gautam|Karl Katgara|Kunal Kumar|Prerna Sharma|Pubali Sanyal|Samantha Tremayne|Shanu Sharma|Trishla Patel|Shamita Shetty|Aarya Mehta|Aditya Srivastav|Ashwini Kumar|Bijon Das Gupta|Deep Raj Rana|Deepak Qazir|Gautam Saugat|Geeta Nair|Honey Lalwani|Hosang Bamji|Indira D'Souza|Jaya Bhattacharya|Karthik|Lalian|Lovina Vaswani|Madhuri|Mansi Upadhay|Manu Rishi Chadha|Paritosh Sand|Prakash Agarwal|Prem Prakash Singh|Rahul Chahan|Ramesh Goyal|Rishav Joshi|Rohit Raj|Sanjay Mishra|Shail Mehta|Shaukat Azmi|Subodh Kumar|Vaishali Thakkar|Vinay Apte|Yashodhan Bal|Ashwani Kumar|Virendra Saxena|Shanoo Sharma|Shahnaz Vahanvaty
title: Saathiya
